actions.text: Amendment SA 2002 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 2002 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S13365; text: CR S13365) To require the Annual Report on International Religious Freedom to include a section to include a section on anti-Semitism and other religious intolerance.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2002 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2002 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Voinovich.

purpose: To require the Annual Report on International Religious Freedom to include a section to include a section on anti-Semitism and other religious intolerance.
